citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10;30 AM on
03-JUN-19.
Knocked on the door, called cell number, honked horn. Licensee texted at 3:15 PM and stated that he had changed
jobs and his hours of availability had changed.
Additional Inspectors
Hammel Kurt, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10;30 AM on
03-JUN-19.
Knocked on the door, called cell number, honked horn.  Licensee texted at 3:15 PM and stated that he had changed
jobs and his hours of availability had changed.
Additional Inspectors
